## CommandRegistry.resolveCommandByPath() method

Resolves command by its path.

**Signature:**

```typescript
resolveCommandByPath(path: string | string[], allowPartialResolve?: boolean): Command | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | string \| string\[\] | Path to command. |
|  allowPartialResolve | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether to allow resolving to closest match. |

**Returns:**

[Command](./noisecord.command.md) \| null

Command, if it was found.
